Yes, there are many brands that make light-colored clothing that is also moisture-wicking. Here are a few suggestions: 

1. Columbia Sportswear: Columbia makes a variety of outdoor clothing, including shirts, pants, and shorts, that are designed to keep you cool and dry through their Omni-Wick™ technology. 2. Under Armour: Under Armour produces a range of performance wear that is both moisture-wicking and lightweight. They have a variety of colors, including light-colored options. 3. Lululemon: Lululemon is a popular brand that makes activewear designed to wick moisture away from the skin while keeping you comfortable and cool. 4. Nike: Nike offers a range of athletic clothing, including options designed for outdoor activities, that are moisture-wicking and lightweight. 5. REI Co-op: REI Co-op offers a variety of outdoor clothing designed for hiking and camping, which includes moisture-wicking and quick-drying properties. When selecting clothing for hiking, look for materials that are lightweight and breathable to allow for airflow, and consider lighter colors to reflect the sun's rays. Additionally, ensure that the clothing has UPF (Ultraviolet Protection Factor) to further protect your skin from the sun's harmful rays.
